response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and potential benefits. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, offering unparalleled advantages. Considering its worth and the opportunity it presents, we kindly invite you to consider purchasing it for $12,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
